DISCOVER DZS Contact Us Contact Us Optical Edge Unique Hardened Solutions for the Optical Access Edge, Innovative Solutions for 5G and O-RAN Mobile Transport. Overview Transform the Optical Edge Our Mobile Transport products are purpose-built routers, switches and gateways designed to facilitate the deployment of 5G networks around the world. We primarily target use cases where O-RAN is driving transformational change including packet-based fronthaul, non-traditional cell sites and In-building 5G small cells. Our new Saber Optical Transport solutions will transform how service provides think about deploying and managing high bandwidth 100G and 400G optical transport and services, pushing high bandwidth transport closer to their customers out to the very EDGE of their network. The services of tomorrow, today Catalyst for 5G Mobile Network Transformation Creating innovative mobile transport solutions for the coming 5G O-RAN transformation. Hardened Coherent Optical Solutions​ Deliver extended temperature 100G & 400G solutions for Access & Metro Transport. More Bandwidth, Closer to Customers DZS Saber starts at 1 RU and scales dynamically. Go anywhere you need to deploy bandwidth. Optical Transport The roll out of high bandwidth Services like 5G and XGS-PON is driving explosive bandwidth growth at the Access EDGE of the network. Over time, today’s legacy 10G and 25G Transport solutions will need to replaced with 100G and 400G coherent optical solutions. The Saber platforms deliver hardened Access EDGE Transport solutions with full support for 100G and 400G DWDM coherent optics. No need for expensive heat exchanges and air-conditioned cabinets. View Optical Transport Solutions Saber 4400 Saber-9103 Solutions Mobile xHaul O-RAN brings open interface standardization and the potential for true RAN network transformation. DZS remains laser focused on creating innovative O-RAN and 5G aligned mobile transport solutions that act as a catalyst for the 5G O-RAN transformation. Our solutions are currently deployed extensively in O-RAN networks and we continue to work closely with service providers and RAN vendors to develop innovative products that enable newer, more cost-effective Mobile networks. View Mobile xHaul Solutions C1216LO C1216RO M4000 Solutions Mobile In-Building In-building WiFi 6 and 5G Small Cell deployments demand a new breed of transport switch. New in-building deployment architectures require higher bandwidths, packet-based synchronization support and much higher power requirements. The DZS E-series collection of POE+ and POE++ ethernet switches are purpose-built to address this next generation of in-building deployments on all fronts. View Mobile In-Building Solutions E3212XP E3210PC E3226PC Experience the Future Take your network to the next level with DZS solutions for broadband access, mobile, optical and the subscriber edge. DISCOVER DZS Contact Us Contact Us subscriber edge dzs cloudcheck DZS CloudCheck Home App Overview Delivering the Ultimate Subscriber Experience DZS CloudCheck is the ideal cloud-based solution for CSPs to monitor, manage, and optimize home Wi-Fi networks for their subscribers, supporting the widest-array of consumer premise equipment. Our platform offers complete visibility, optimization, and reporting of subscriber networks, from their broadband service to every connected device in their home, driving down support costs while helping increase revenue and customer satisfaction. The DZS CloudCheck Home App provides Wi-Fi network visibility for customer self-service. Learn more about DZS CloudCheck The Challenge For Broadband Providers Secular residential broadband trends in higher demand for bandwidth and reliability have accelerated, presenting communication service providers with new challenges: Increased demand from remote work, streaming, and gaming applications require high-bandwidth and lower latency connections A lack of end-to-end access network and WiFi management solutions​ Full-network visibility New WiFi technologies that promise, but do not deliver improved performance to the device Subscriber connectivity issues that drive significant OPEX, subscriber churn, and lower NPS scores Being able to easily derive meaningful insight from subscriber data​ Manage and Grow Your Access Network End-to-End Access Network Visibility Provide customer care & field technicians with data & analytics needed to quickly identify & solve subscriber connectivity problems. Real-Time Optimization of Every Connection AI-driven systems monitor & proactively optimize home networks to ensure the highest possible speed & throughput to all connected devices. Vendor-Neutral Open-Standards Support Connect to hundreds of devices, protecting your existing hardware investments, with the flexibility to mix-and-match vendors in the future. DZS CloudCheck The Evolving Residential Broadband Experience Abrupt changes in demand, required reliability, bandwidth, traffic patterns, security, and application mix have transformed the residential broadband market market and subscriber expectations. Read The White Paper How it Works Watch now Actionable Reporting The Visibility You Need at No Extra Cost DZS CloudCheck includes dozens of metrics that are utilized across our customers’ organizations to help them increase revenues and decrease costs. Network Operations Network operations teams utilize our data and metrics to monitor for problems and do network upgrade planning. Marketing Marketing teams use our data and metrics to identify neighborhoods and subscribers that would benefit from and be willing to pay for upgraded services. Customer Service Customer service teams have an end-to-end view on what is going on in a subscriber’s home and use our data and metrics to pinpoint performance and connectivity issues. Executives Executives use our data and metrics to help them tie network performance data to net promoter scores and prioritize improvements that increase net promoter scores. CloudCheck CPE Catalog CPE devices currently compatible with the DZS CloudCheck agent The DZS CloudCheck agent is suitable for a wide range of access systems and platforms, such as DOCSIS, ADSL, VDSL, G.Fast, GPON, Active Ethernet, XGSPON and 5G FWA, plus future standards of 25GS-PON and 50G PON, granting ISPs and subscribers a single point of access to the home network. DZS CloudCheck agent-compatible devices comprise best-in-class CPE solutions for every need and are represented by 18 Brands, 200+CPE models, and 6 Chipset vendors. CPE Catalog Learn More About DZS Cloud Deliver the ultimate broadband subscriber experience through advanced network orchestration and predictive, proactive connectivity optimization. . DZS Cloud . DZS Xtreme . DZS Expresse Customer Success TalkTalk Leverages DZS Cloud EDGE Software Solutions to Optimize Customer Experience “To optimize the customer experience in the highly competitive UK broadband services market, we have focused on maximizing end-to-end service quality for our direct and wholesale customers with DZS Cloud EDGE software solutions.” Phil Haslam, CTO, TalkTalk. Learn More Talk To Us With DZS CloudCheck, we can offer CSPs a service assurance and cloud-based WiFi in-home consumer experience management solution unrivaled in the industry. And we are doing it with no upfront commitments, a pay-as-you-go pricing model, and no contract lock-in. flic.io/about-us: :VGQH545: About Us | Flic Smart Button ProductsFlic ButtonControl anything with a push.Flic TwistSimplify your smart home.Flic Hub MiniA tiny yet powerful computer.Flic Hub LR1000+ compatible devices.AccessoriesUpgrade your Flic button.Business SolutionsIndustriesHealthcarePersonal SafetyLone WorkerSportsLogistics and IndustryOffice and Facility ManagementRetailAutomotiveSchools & Child CareBusiness SolutionsSolutionsApp ControlCorporate GiftFlic InsideFlic Hub LR SDKDevice ManagerAll ApplicationsFlic MQTTFlic HID & MIDIFlic for MacFlic for OSCFlic WristbandDeveloper PortalAboutAbout UsCareersNewsBlogContactnullShop Products ProductsFlic ButtonControl anything with a push.Flic TwistSimplify your smart home.Flic Hub MiniA tiny yet powerful computer.Flic Hub LR1000+ compatible devices.AccessoriesUpgrade your Flic button.Industries IndustriesHealthcarePersonal SafetyLone WorkerSportsLogistics and IndustryOffice and Facility ManagementRetailAutomotiveSchools & Child CareBusiness SolutionsSolutions SolutionsApp ControlCorporate GiftFlic InsideFlic Hub LR SDKDevice ManagerAll ApplicationsFlic MQTTFlic HID & MIDIFlic for MacFlic for OSCFlic WristbandDeveloper PortalAbout UsCareersNewsBlogContactShopShortcut Labs AB Mission"To make digital services more accessible and easy to use with physical controllers that anyone can use and understand.We make technology which simplifies life and empowers all people, not just the most interested."What We Stand For SimplicityTechnology should be simple to use and understand. That's why we value simplicity above all else.Using Flic removes unnecessary friction and boils down the experience of interacting with a service to a simple button push. Simplicity dictates how we design our products, work, and think. ACCESSIBILITYAccessibility has two meanings:(1) Everyone should enjoy technology's benefits regardless of abilities, and (2) Technology should be maximally accessible where needed.For instance, a smartphone app behind a lock screen is not maximally accessible, while a physical representation of an app can be. EMPOWERMENT FOR EVERYONEGreat technology empowers its users but is seldom accessible to everyone. Some users are less interested in or are less capable of learning, configuring, and utilizing technology in the best way.Empowerment for Everyone means that our technology should help empower all users, not just the most interested. INSPIRE CREATIVITY & INNOVATIONWe pride ourselves on being creative and innovative people, and we want to inspire others to be innovative and creative.Therefore, we make products with as few limits as possible and with open and transparent APIs so that anyone can use the products for creative projects and innovative businesses. Our StoryShorcut Labs AB was founded in 2013. We started as an Incubator at KTH innovation where we created Flic, the first Smart Button in the world. Shortly after we launched Flic on Indiegogo and broke the funding record for all Nordic crowdfunding campaigns.In 2019, we redesigned our original button and created Flic Button, which was much more sustainable and gave customers a better experience.From there we started to integrate with big smart home players while also expanding our B2B business to hospitality, healthcare and so many more industries. +15Employees +10Years in Business +100Shipping Countries Worldwide +200Integrations +800.000Buttons Shipped 4Successful Crowdfundings Trustpilot “The fact that it’s just a simple button also allows me to operate it hands-free.”Winnie Yang “One of Swedens most successful Indiegogo campaigns, it raised $800,000 -- eight times its goal.”Madhumita Venkataramanan “Sometimes a good old button is just the best way to get something done.”Kyle VanHemert “Flic is the simplest to use and best performing of an ever-growing area in the smart home world: smart buttons.”Paul Lambkin “One button to rule them all: Smart switch controls phones, lights, plays music and can even order you a pizza.”Richard Gray “Simple interactions between man and machine – such as the light switch – can remain but be performed in a smarter and more versatile way.”Shane HickeyManagement Joacim Westlund PrandlCo-Founder Amir SharifatCo-Founder Daniel AbdiuCEO Oskar ÖbergCTO Per-Gustaf HedbergHead of MarketingJoin our team!Check out our job openings Careers Stockholm Shortcut Labs AB Drottning Kristinas väg 41 114 28 Stockholm Sweden Contact us Sign up to our newsletter for the latest news, exclusive discounts and FREE SHIPPING worldwide on your first order! DISCOVER DZS Contact Us Contact Us optical edge optical transport Optical Transport Hardened, compact, and modular DWDM transport platform – featuring 100G-400G per lambda, transponders, muxponders and multi-degree CDC FlexGrid ROADM. Overview Optical Transport The DZS Saber platforms were the first to bring hardened coherent optical solutions to the optical EDGE, delivering up to 400Gbps with each wavelength in modular 1RU solutions that can be deployed in unimproved remote cabinets and huts, resulting in savings of up to $200k per location versus traditional solutions, and stacked for extraordinary capacity. Reaching unamplified distances of up to 120km, the Saber 4400 also features support for multi-degree Flex Grid ROADM in the industry’s smallest form factor and transponders/muxponders. swedtel.com/services/: :VGQH545: Services – Swedtel Swedtel The telecom business builder, Worldwide. Home About us Services Contact us The telecom business builder, Worldwide. Home About us Services Contact us REDEFINING POWERFUL NETWORKS From operational change to digital infrastructure, cell tower solutions and cloud-based software, Swedtel helps vendors and service providers navigate the world of new technologies and customer demands. CONSULTANCY & OPERATIONS Swedtel consults at a deep operational and technical level to help telecommunication operators run smoothly, securely, profitably and within the law. From regulatory services to due diligence, fraud analysis, process auditing or organisational transformation, Swedtel has been helping operators excel at what they do, for more than five decades. HUMAN CAPITAL As the digital economy evolves, so too does the nature of the 21st century workforce. New digital skills and technological capabilities are in short supply, which is where Swedtel steps in to provide the right resources at the right time, to keep networks running smoothly. Swedtel also helps operators to achieve service and sales efficiencies by deploying bespoke, comprehensive Field Force and Work Force Management mobility solutions. PRODUCTS & SOLUTIONS CYBERSECURITYSwedtel’s cybersecurity consultants make it possible for organisations to focus on their core business – rather than worrying about IT and cybersecurity concerns. The team works closely with customers to help them select the very best products and solutions from multiple vendors like Nutanix, Fortinet, SentineOne, Gigamon and F5 – all with one goal in mind: to unleash productivity by safeguarding invaluable data assets and IT infrastructures. CELL TOWER OPTIMIZATIONPartnering with world-leading battery innovators enables Swedtel to consult on and deploy incredible new cell phone tower storage technologies. We work to provide access to the latest supercapacitor hardware – batteries with great power density, extreme temperature resilience, and superior charge and surge capabilities. PRODUCTS & SOLUTIONS CYBERSECURITYSwedtel’s cybersecurity consultants make it possible for organisations to focus on their core business – rather than worrying about IT and cybersecurity concerns. The team works closely with customers to help them select the very best products and solutions from multiple vendors like Nutanix, Fortinet, SentineOne, Gigamon and F5 – all with one goal in mind: to unleash productivity by safeguarding invaluable data assets and IT infrastructures. CELL TOWER OPTIMIZATIONPartnering with world-leading battery innovators enables Swedtel to consult on and deploy incredible new cell phone tower storage technologies. We work to provide access to the latest supercapacitor hardware – batteries with great power density, extreme temperature resilience, and superior charge and surge capabilities. NETWORK SERVICES Over many years, we have supported operators with radio access network (RAN) design and optimisation services. These are critically important activities that give operators the ability to serve their customers through high quality, well maintained networks at all times. These crucial services include real-time performance monitoring, network dimensioning and planning, final site radio configuration, network audits, network quality maintenance, network acceptance and new features activation. PLANNINGSwedtel helps operators to design best-in-class networks, supporting the planning of small cells and Wi-Fi systems, fixed networks, frequency planning, capacity planning and propagation model tuning. OPTIMIZATIONSwedtel works hand-in-glove with operators to optimise their networks and customer services. We help to optimise network coverage, analyse network performance, design new feature trials, and implement geo-location capabilities P.O Box 68367,Riyadh 11527,Kingdom of Saudi ArabiaPhone: +966 11 473 5990Email: swedtel@swedtel.com COMPANY Home About us Our Services Contact Us OUR SERVICES Consultancy Services Products & Solutions Network Services Resource Provisioning SOCIAL PROFILES Twitter LinkedIn Swedtel2023. swedtel.com/about-us/: :VGQH545: About us – Swedtel Swedtel The telecom business builder, Worldwide. Home About us Services Contact us The telecom business builder, Worldwide. Home About us Services Contact us FUTUREPROOFING THE DIGITAL ECONOMY Working side by side with operators across multiple markets, we provide ICT network design and execution, cybersecurity, battery storage and products and services for business and corporate customers. MISSIONTo build futureproof telecommunications companies by increasing shareholder value through sustainable ICT services, platforms, products, and solutions VISIONTo forge a digitally advanced, safe, secure, and sustainable telecommunications technology ecosystem that serves customers and consumers today, tomorrow and into the future. VALUES TRANSPARENTEvery Swedtel product and service is uniquely consulted, designed, and deployed by working in close partnership with operators. PIONEERINGSwedtel develops services and products that meet the demands of today’s digital economy and the challenges of the future. ChallengingThrough research, testing and industry participation, Swedtel builds upon existing technologies to pioneer the development of tomorrow’s solutions. ADVANCED TECHNOLOGIES Swedtel’s telecommunications networks, hardware, software, and consultancy services are designed to empower and unleash business innovation in the digital economy. From fintech to cell tower energy storage, cloud, and cybersecurity solutions, Swedtel pioneers the development of cost effective advanced telecommunications technologies for deployment around the world. PARTNERSHIP NETWORKS Partnerships are an integral part of Swedtel’s strategy in the development and execution of consultancy services and network service solutions.To maximise the impact of those we collaborate with, we have created specific networks. These include an Investor Network to create fast and lasting value growth for telecoms companies, a Human Resources Network that comprises specialist consultant firms, a Vendor Network of providers and manufacturers, and a Market Network for knowledge sharing and business development opportunities. PARTNERSHIP NETWORKS Partnerships are an integral part of Swedtel’s strategy in the development and execution of consultancy services and network service solutions.To maximise the impact of those we collaborate with, we have created specific networks. These include an Investor Network to create fast and lasting value growth for telecoms companies, a Human Resources Network that comprises specialist consultant firms, a Vendor Network of providers and manufacturers, and a Market Network for knowledge sharing and business development opportunities. OUR LEGACY Formed in one of the world’s most advanced technology markets, Swedtel was launched in Sweden in 1968 – borne out of the skills and expertise of a team of world leading practitioners from the global telecommunications giant, Telia.Initially operating as a Telia subsidiary, Swedtel became the world’s first operator-owned telecommunications consultancy provider: a powerful source of technical knowledge that has gone on to deliver on over 600 government and private sector projects in more than 100 countries.After 1968, Swedtel’s founders went on to build a business that has operated across Africa, Asia,Europe, and the Middle East. Since then, the company has gone on to develop an extensive partner network and wide ownership structure with operations that have always been rooted in a singular, sharp focus: the deployment of advanced technologies and consultancy services that build profitable, sustainable, and commercially competitive telecommunications companies.From its global headquarters in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, Swedtel continues to build on its unique legacyas a market maker, developing advanced network solutions and turnkey consultancy services to operators in some of the world’s fastest moving, and most fiercely competitive markets. DISCOVER DZS Contact Us Contact Us access edge fiber access Fiber Access Hardened solutions in flexible form factors with leading performance, density and in-place upgrades from 10G to 50G-PON (50 Gigabit-capable Passive Optical Networks). Overview Fiber Access The DZS Velocity Optical Line Terminal (OLT) portfolio, environmentally hardened across the entire range of solutions, has form factors ranging from fixed 1RU units through 2-slot, 6-slot, 14-slot and 16-slot chassis systems. It is the industry’s broadest access portfolio. Complemented by system-on-a-card technology that is common for all systems, DZS Velocity empowers service providers to leap to multi-gigabit services at scale by enabling rapid transition from GPON to XGS-PON and gigabit Ethernet to 10 gigabit Ethernet and on to 50G/100G services via any service port across the range of DZS systems, including stackable options. krafman.se/netmore-polar-propnet-ab/5592: :VGQH545: Netmore Polar PropNet AB - 559282-9112 - Gratis årsredovisning Skanna QR koden med en mobiltelefon för att ladda ner appen X Skanna QR koden med en mobiltelefon för att ladda ner appen X Sök på alla bolag och firmor Sök Netmore Polar PropNet AB Org.nr: 559282-9112 Netmore Polar PropNet AB, 559282-9112 är ett aktiebolag med postadress i Stockholm som registrerades år 2020 och är verksamt inom Tillverkning av kommunikationsutrustning. Netmore Polar PropNet AB har haft sitt nuvarande firmanamn sedan 2021-02-27. Aktiekapitalet är 50 000 kr. Postat av infogiver Citat: Ursprungligen postat av MrSkargard Ingen av de misstänkta har väl dömts eller åtalats för narkotikabrott? Svårt att dömmas innan ett rättegångs datum men har man narkotika i blodet, speciellt om man regelbundet brukar tex cannabis är det i princip omöjligt att inte åka dit, därför tar nog de flesta ett strafföreläggande i dessa fall, vilket även är vanligast när det gäller ringa narkotikabrott, alltså för eget bruk. Antagligen har föreläggandet inte vunnit laga kraft än. Nu spekulerar jag men detta är faktiskt oerhört vanligt. Citat: Den vanligaste påföljden för ringa narkotikabrott är strafföreläggande följt av böter genom dom och åtalsunderlåtelse http://sv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Narkotikabrott_i_Sverige Nu var det Philip Olsson som var misstänkt för narkotikabrott, men enligt uppgifter så använde Karl Värme droger regelbundet. Simon Arnamo efterlyst! Postat av infogiver Citat: Ursprungligen postat av MrSkargard Svaret på frågan är nej alltså. Dina spekulationer om ett eventuellt strafföreläggande lämnar jag därhän. Obekräftade uppgifter antar jag? Vi får väl hoppas att han slutat med skiten om uppgifterna stämmer. Ja, svaret är nej, som jag skrev i svaret. Men det är väl av intresse för personer som läser att få veta hur narkotikabrott sköts rent allmänt i Sverige? Det är även en förklaring till varför han är misstänkt för narkotikabrott i FUP men inte blir åtalad för det, det mest logiska är att Philip Olsson accepterat ett strafföreläggande och på så sätt inte blir åtalad för det. Med tanke på var uppgifterna kommer skulle jag vilja påstå att det är väldigt tillförlitliga, men har knappast något pissprov till bevis. Rent spontant undrar jag ju hur medlemmar i SMR har drog glorifierande bilder på sin öppna facebook sidan utan att någon annan medlem verkar reagera? Simon Arnamo efterlyst! Postat av Njorden Citat: Ursprungligen postat av Rosa-Pantern Beror väl på vad man menar med "oskyldig kill". Det är väl rätt klarlagt att upprinnelsen till handgemänget är att hårda ord utbyts. Och Jocke Med Kniven (som han kallades på "byn") var dömd för småbrott som snatterier, stölder, brott mot knivlagen, narkotikabrott och annat som pundare gärna ställer till med. Samhället har blivit lite tryggare i och med hans frånfälle. Så man skulle kunna säga att nationalisterna gjorde en samhällstjänst genom att ta hans liv? Visar 1 till 20 av 41. www.byannavogel.se/: :VGQH545: By Annavogel 0 Gå vidare till innehåll By Annavogel Coaching MAKE:Business Gruppcoaching MAKE:Sessions 1:1 Women in Business & Creativity 1:1 Coaching:Lab 3 timmar Workshops Kafferepet Dream Lab Blogg Podcast Shop Om mig Kontakt Öppna menyn Stäng menyn By Annavogel Coaching MAKE:Business Gruppcoaching MAKE:Sessions 1:1 Women in Business & Creativity 1:1 Coaching:Lab 3 timmar Workshops Kafferepet Dream Lab Blogg Podcast Shop Om mig Kontakt Öppna menyn Stäng menyn Mapp: Coaching Tillbaka MAKE:Business Gruppcoaching MAKE:Sessions 1:1 Women in Business & Creativity 1:1 Coaching:Lab 3 timmar Mapp: Workshops Tillbaka Kafferepet Dream Lab Blogg Podcast Shop Om mig Kontakt Jag coachar kreatörer och entreprenörer att stå i sin kraft och nåhållbar framgång. Kontakta mig MAKE:BUSINESSStå i din kraft som kreatöroch entreprenör - gruppcoaching. Är du redo för nästa nivå i ditt företag? Dags att levla upp utan att brinna upp?MAKE:Business är programmet för dig som vill nå ut till dina drömkunder, ta bra betalt och känna dig fri som egenföretagare. Under åtta veckor får du verktyg, inspiration och vägledning till ett autentiskt, framgångsrikt och hållbart företagande. Kursen är online på Zoom och sker i grupp. Låt 2024 vara året då du tar makten över din kreativitet och ditt entreprenörsskap, och uppnår dina drömmar. Läs mer och ansök Det är jag som är Anna Jag är en obotligt nyfiken coach, poddare, sångerska och låtskrivare. Min bakgrund har jag i kultur- och nöjesbranschen där jag har drivit eget produktionsbolag. Jag fascineras av kraft, kreativitet och hållbarhet. Både din och min.Om du är en kreatör eller entreprenör som vill levla upp utan att brinna upp så har du kommit helt rätt.Vill du anlita mig som coach? Hör av dig! Kontakta mig Ladda ner min gratisguide Mod att ta plats som kreatör och entreprenör.I den här guiden går jag igenom vanliga rädslor kring att ta plats och hur du kan komma förbi dem. Du får också tips på hur du kan synas mer med din expertis och din kreativitet. Guiden är gratis och kommer direkt till din inbox! Ladda ner din guide En kaffe med Vogel En kaffe med Vogel En kaffe med Vogel PODCAST En kaffe med Vogel är en koffeinladdad podd om kreativitet, entreprenörskap och mental hälsa. Här snackar jag med trevliga gäster, dricker kaffe och ger tips och inspiration till dig som lyssnar. Lyssna här SENASTE NYTT PÅ BLOGGEN Featured 21 jan. 2024 Att ge upp en kreativ dröm och hitta en ny 21 jan. 2024 21 jan. 2024 7 dec. 2023 Vår roliga podd och det lackar mot jul 7 dec. 2023 7 dec. 2023 7 dec. 2023 Att försöka charma den med armarna i kors. 7 dec. 2023 7 dec. 2023 11 sep. 2023 Vad är mod? 11 sep. 2023 11 sep. 2023 9 sep. 2023 Kreativt experiment pågår 9 sep. 2023 9 sep. 2023 3 sep. 2023 Gå inåt för att kunna gå utåt 3 sep. 2023 3 sep. 2023 “Anna coached me in the spring and summer of 2019 and it was a marvelous experience. She was always very well prepared and had several ideas for me to choose from to drive our sessions. In between sessions she was also available for questions and concerns. I felt so empowered every time I walked out of a session and excited to see Anna again. Her attitude is great for people who seek not just guidance and care, but also fun, humor and want to be heard. I’d do it all again in a heartbeat.”— NICOLE MICHAELIS, UX WRITER AT SPOTIFY, CONTENT STRATEGIST & POET“Din coaching ledde mig till ett drömjobb och ny härlig energi. Dina kurser och heldagarsevent jag deltagit på har verkligen varit givande, herre jösses jag tar mig tid att utöva mindfulness :) Det är en stor förändring för mig. TACK!”.”— EMMA CAJANDER, COMMUNITY MANAGER HJÄRNFONDEN Några samarbetspartners & vänner Välkommen hit ♡By Annavogel, Hey Maker StudioRenstiernas Gata 21, Stockholm Kontakt Integritetspolicy :CGDE345:

Bakgrund Sverige införde 1766 som första land i världen pressfrihet genom den dåvarande tryckfrihetsförordningen. Detta gav varje medborgare en lagstadgad rätt att bland annat fritt framföra sina åsikter i tryckt skrift utan förhandsgranskning eller censur. Flashback har funnits som tidning sedan 1983, och på internet sedan 1995. Diskussionsforumet Flashback Forum lanserades 2000. En plattform som vilar på en nonkonformistisk värdegrund, och där medlemmarna har möjlighet att vara anonyma. Det är socialt accepterat på Flashback att bryta mot konsensus, och även de med avvikande åsikter är välkomna i samtalet. Yttrandefrihet är viktigt. Flashback har en lång historia av att värna om det fria ordet, och har som målsättning att föra den svenska yttrandefrihetstraditionen vidare. Att aktivt försvara åsikts- och yttrandefriheten, även när det gäller de som vill avskaffa eller begränsa samma rättigheter. Flashback tror att detta agerande långsiktigt bidrar till en minskad polarisering i samhället, och en ökad förståelse för de med motsatta åsikter. Flashback är politiskt och religiöst obunden. Rapportera missbruk Det bästa sättet att anmäla innehåll som olämpligt på Flashback är att klicka på länken "Rapportera" som visas under varje inlägg. Obs! Rapporteringsfunktionen visas enbart när du är inloggad. Om du vill anmäla något som bryter mot reglerna, men saknar ett konto eller inte kan se innehållet, måste du kanske be en vän att hjälpa dig. Be en vän med ett konto att anmäla innehållet med hjälp av rapporteringsfunktionen. Ifall du inte är nöjd med åtgärden, så kan du efteråt kontakta någon av det aktuella forumets moderatorer. Om varken rapportering eller dialog med moderatorerna fungerat, så kan du även skicka en anmälan till: forum@ABUSEflashbackABUSE.org Om någon bryter mot gällande lagstiftning och därmed även reglerna på Flashback Forum, så är vår målsättning att agera så snabbt som möjligt. Observera att vi inte kan behandla din anmälan förrän vi har haft möjlighet att granska ditt ärende. I din anmälan ska du ange så många detaljer som möjligt, inklusive direktlänkar till innehållet du anmäler, information om när dessa blivit rapporterade och med vem eller vilka moderatorer du har haft en dialog. Flashback lagrar inte information som kan användas i syfte att identifiera någon som person. Alla medlemmar är anonyma. Detta är användardata som Flashback enligt gällande lagstiftning inte behöver spara. Flashback kan därför aldrig lämna ut uppgifter till tredje part om enskilda medlemmars identitet, då detta avser personuppgifter som Flashback inte lagrar.
